title: Pokémon GO, UNITE, Masters EX, and Café ReMix for iOS get special events for 26th franchise anniversary
content:
Pokémon just turned 26. With that, some of the games available for iPhone users are getting special events this week, including Pokémon GO, UNITE, Masters EX, and Café ReMix. Read on as we round up everything new with these iOS games.

more…

The post Pokémon GO, UNITE, Masters EX, and Café ReMix for iOS get special events for 26th franchise anniversary appeared first on 9to5Mac.
